alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 1:50PM AKDT until March 19 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Over Summits of the Central Interior. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast winds gusting to 40 mph will develop over summits such as Ptarmagin Pass this evening and continue into Sunday morning. This will cause blowing and drifting snow tonight and snow drifts will form. The winds will decrease Sunday and conditions will improve then.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
